products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout Topaz Blue Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Unilux PVC Blackout Topaz Blue Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £10.04 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A stunning jewelled blue shade. Give your bathroom or kitchen a modern makeover with the Unilux PVC Blackout Roller Blind. This roller blind is made from moisture resistant PVC and is guaranteed to give your space a fresh feel thanks to its contemporary design and crisp white finish. In addition, the blackout material will provide the required peace and privacy.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2378 Fabric Colour: Topaz Blue Material: Fiberglass core laminated with PVC layered coating Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Unilux Powder Blue (Moisture Resistant)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Unilux Powder Blue (Moisture Resistant) Bathroom Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Bathroom Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3048mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Joins: Blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
 	Fabric Composition: PVC
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
